summary: This is an internal email from August 15, 2019, requesting assistance to conduct 1-3 interviews of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding Jeffrey Epstein the following day. It appears to be a coordination message related to the investigation following Epstein's death.

events.title: Planned inmate interviews at MCC regarding Epstein
events.description: The email requests assistance to conduct 1-3 interviews of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An internal request was made on August 15, 2019, to conduct inmate interviews at MCC regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
The interviews were planned for the following day (August 16, 2019).
The request was for 1-3 interviews, indicating an active investigative effort post-Epstein's death.
The document shows ongoing investigation activities related to Epstein's case and circumstances at MCC.
